description: A DAV file is a compressed and encrypted video file created by DVR365 or Dahua Technologyâ€™s digital surveillance system. These systems connected to a closed-circuit television (CCTV) camera surveillance system. The footage videos received from these camera is store as DAV file in the system. Since DAV files are encrypted, only the CCTV system that created them or some specialized media players can open them. DAV files can also be converted to AVI file format.
